meanings.definition: A person who writes regularly for a blog.
meanings.sent1: Many bloggers share their thoughts online.
meanings.sent2: Bloggers often create content for websites.
meanings.sent3: The bloggers had a friendly competition to see who could write the most posts in a week.
meanings.sent4: In the world of online writing, bloggers are the modern-day storytellers.
meanings.sent5: The community of bloggers was buzzing with excitement about the upcoming conference.

meanings.sent1: Bloggers enjoy connecting with their audience through their posts.
meanings.sent2: Many bloggers use social media to promote their blog.
meanings.sent3: The group of bloggers decided to start a collaborative project together.
meanings.sent4: In today's digital age, bloggers play a significant role in shaping opinions.
meanings.sent5: The event was a great opportunity for bloggers to network and learn from each other.
